mapper.select: select mber_schdul_bgnde, mber_schdul_endde, mber_schdul_nm, mber_schdul_cn, mber_schdul_sn, mber_sn, mber_schdul_color, mber_allday from member_schedule where mber_sn =#{mber_sn}

select mber_schdul_bgnde, mber_schdul_endde, mber_schdul_nm, mber_schdul_cn, mber_schdul_sn, mber_sn, mber_schdul_color, mber_allday from member_schedule where mber_sn = #{mber_sn} and
mber_schdul_bgnde > case when mber_allday = 0 then to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') when mber_allday = 1 then to_char(to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') end order by mber_schdul_bgnde
